title: stringent controls
extract: Definition of stringent. 1 : tight, constricted. 2 : marked by rigor, strictness, or severity especially with regard to rule or standard stringent decontamination procedures.
extract_html: Definition of stringent. 1 : tight, constricted. 2 : marked by rigor, strictness, or severity especially with regard to rule or standard stringent decontamination procedures.
